comment: Contractor is back on site and is busy with roofing. Progress delayed due to late payment.

The contractor returned back to site  on the 1st Nov 2011. The project was on hold due to non payment. (The contractor intend to apply for extention of time when he receive his first payment). The roof is completted. Contractor is busy with finishes.
mitigation: To follow up with Dept.Education on payment to contractors.

comment: Contractor terminated due to poor perfomance. Closeout report to be submitted.  Project to be implemented in 2012/13 financial year due to lack of funds
mitigation: Project to be allocated to building periodic contractors for completion. DoE to make funds available in 2012/13 financial year.

comment: Project delayed due to alleged water seepage around the school premises. Re-assessment has been conducted and resolved  that  the retaining wall be erected to prevent the water overflow.
mitigation: Project to commence in Jan 2012.  To fast track  progress

comment: On retention. Contractor still to attend to defects
Project is behind schedule. The practical completion was planned for February 2011. The contractor is experiencing cash flow problem and put on terms.
mitigation: Contractor to enter into cession with sub contractor.

comment: Practical completion is delayed by the electricity connection and the aprons which the contractor claims they were not part of the scope of works on the signed contract.

comment: The contractor abandoned the site due to non payment.  14/09/2011

The contractor is behind schedule due to late payment. The contractor has been put on terms.
On final account to be submitted after cession is complete
